name: The Prophet's Way
description: The Prophets Way app hosts rich content on various Islamic topics including Creed (Aqidah), Methodology (Manhaj), Science of Hadith (Usool al-Hadith), Science of Fiqh (Usool al-Fiqh), Biography (Seerah), Islamic Verdicts (Fatawa) and others, delivered/authored by the noble scholar Shaikh Abu Abdir Rahmaan Yahya Silmy as-Saylani.  Recommendation of senior scholars for the Shaikh: http://www.ahlulhadith.in/recommendations-scholars/  New content is added frequently, as and when the Shaikh delivers lectures, sermons (khutbas).
